full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement: Rocker Bioreactor Platform B

#### Reference Number:
WS4408965173-Doc4506113583

#### Amendment Number:
4

#### Solicitation Number:
WS4408965173

#### Publication Date:
March 26, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date:
April 30, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

#### Expected Contract Start Date:
March 14, 2024

#### Expected Contract End Date:
No specified end date

#### Tender Status:
The tender notice has expired.

#### Goods and Services Requirements:

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a contractor to supply and deliver a Rocker bioreactor platform with a capacity of 2-25L.

### Contracting Information:

* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available
* Email: [Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC)](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice Details:

* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19220183?extsite=MTkyMjAxODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* UNSPSC Code: 41161500 (Cell and Tissue Culture Products)
* Trade Agreements: The tender notice is subject to various trade agreements, including NAFTA and CETA.

### Evaluation Criteria:

* The contractor must submit the bid by April 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
